Installation¶

To install required dependencies, you can use pip:

pip install -r requirements.tInstallation

Run the following commands to start the application:

source venv/bin/activate
pip3 install -r requirements.txt
flask run

After installing the package, you can run the application by executing:

flask run

To populate MySQL database with sample data, you can execute the following command: .. code-block:: bash

python3 seed.py

To reset MySQL database, you can execute the following command: .. code-block:: bash

python3 reset-database.py
